title.list: 1. CTRL+C -- Copy 2. CTRL+v -- Paste 3. CTRL+X -- Cut 4. CTRL+Z -- Undo 5. CTRL+A -- Select all 5. DELETE -- Files to Recycle bin 5. Shift +DELETE -- To delete the files and folder permanently

1. f2 -- Rename the selected item.
2. f3 -- search for file or folder.
3. ALT+Enter -- view the properties of selected items.
4. ALT+f4 -- Close the active item.
5. ALT+Space-bar -- Open shortcut menu of active tab.
6. CTRL + ESC -- Display the start menu.
7. ALT + TAB -- Switch between the open items.
8. Windows Key + D -- Display the desktop.
9. Windows Key + E -- Open my computer.
10.Windows Key + F -- Search for a file or a folder.
11.Windows Key + R -- Open the Run dialog box.
12.Windows Key + L -- Lock the keyboard.
13.Windows Key + U -- Open Utility Manager.
14.CTRL+SHIFT+N -- Create new folder.
15.CTRL+SHIFT+ESC -- Task Manager.
